description:
![Screenshot of Open Visual Traceroute](https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-22771718/images/5765c45f492a3a4V55vY/traceroute3D.PNG)	

##Features

####Traceroute
* Traceroute feature that allows to see on a World 3D map what path the data is taking to go from your computer to the target server.

####Network packets sniffer
* Network packets sniffer allows to see what data is being sent back and forth from the local system to the Internet. 

####Whois
* "Who is" feature allows to get public information about a domain.

####3D/2D visualization
* All data is vizualized in a 3D World map. Low end computers or exotic OS that would have issues with OpenGL drivers can run the program using the 2D map.

####Free and Open source
* The entire source code is fully available for download on Sourceforge.

####Cross platform
* The software is written in Java and runs on Windows, MacOS X, Ubuntu, OpenSUSE.

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/open-visual-traceroute/readme.md)**

***
**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**
***
summary: Open source cross-platform Java Visual Networking tool
author: Leo Lewis
